EmailTemplate.name: Dec6Web:Career-Change.Thank You Dec6
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Attending our Webinar on Career Transitions
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Webinar Attendee}},
Thank you for taking the time out of your busy schedule to attend our webinar “From Burned Out to Fired Up: 3 Principles to Guide Your Independent Career Transition." To follow-up on the information provided on Thursday, December 6th, we are providing links to the Webinar recording, slide deck, and a few other helpful resources below. Recorded webinar <http://www.mbopartners.com/webinar-burned-out-fired-3-principles-guide-your-independent-career-transition> Webinar slide deck <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/Emotional-Intelligence-Webinar-Slides.pdf> Featured Speaker Ingrid Sarrat Website <http://www.mycoachingcircle.com/> Six Seconds Emotional Intelligence Website <http://www.6seconds.org/> We invite you to sign-up <http://info.mbopartners.com/2012SeriesSignUp.html> to stay informed about future webinars in our series. If you have any topic recommendations or feedback, please email webinar@mbopartners.com <mailto:webinar@mbopartners.com>.
Thank you, MBO PARTNERS t: 1-800-220-0469
e: info@mbopartners.com
